A C D E G H I L P R S T U 

C

Calendar - Interface in interfaces
This interface specifies a calendar that can create, store and exchange Appointments (which themselves can have Comments) with other instances using a network connection.
CalendarException - Exception in exceptions
This exception is meant for error specific to the Calendar, especially underlying internal layers/APIs.
CalendarException() - Constructor for exception exceptions.CalendarException
 
CalendarException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CalendarException
 
CalendarException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CalendarException
 
CalendarException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CalendarException
 
CalendarImpl - Class in implementations
This class implements a Calendar using a SharkKB to store and receive Appointments from and a SyncKP to transfer Appointments and Comments to other instances.
CalendarImpl(String, String, URI, String, boolean) - Constructor for class implementations.CalendarImpl
This constructor sets up a new Calendar by initializing the used SharkKB, SharkEngine and SyncKP.
CalendarTestSuite - Class in test
 
CalendarTestSuite() - Constructor for class test.CalendarTestSuite
 
ChangedAppointmentListener - Interface in interfaces
This interface specifies a listener that can be registered on a Calendar instance and is called when a new Appointment was created (or received) or a Comment was added to an Appointment.
closeConnection() - Method in class implementations.CalendarImpl
This method closes a connection of the used Shark engine.
Comment - Interface in interfaces
This interface specifies a Comment of a Appointment of a Calendar that can be added and retrieved from an Appointment.
COMMENT_SUFFIX - Static variable in class implementations.CommentImpl
 
CommentCreationDateComparator - Class in utils
This class offers comparison of Comments by their creation date.
CommentCreationDateComparator() - Constructor for class utils.CommentCreationDateComparator
 
CommentImpl - Class in implementations
This class represents a Comment that was created by a CalendarImpl instance and is stored in a SharkKB Information.
CommentImpl(Calendar, Appointment, Information) - Constructor for class implementations.CommentImpl
Constructor creates a representation of a Comment stored in the passed Information and managed by the passed Calendar.
compare(Appointment, Appointment) - Method in class utils.AppointmentStartComparator
This Method compares two Appointments by their start date.
compare(Comment, Comment) - Method in class utils.CommentCreationDateComparator
This method compares two Comments by their creation date.
CONNECTION_TIMEOUT - Static variable in class implementations.CalendarImpl
the connection timeout used by SharkEngine
contextPointAdded(ContextPoint) - Method in class implementations.AppointmentUpdatedListener
 
contextPointRemoved(ContextPoint) - Method in class implementations.AppointmentUpdatedListener
 
cpChanged(ContextPoint) - Method in class implementations.AppointmentUpdatedListener
 
createAppointment(String, Date, long, String, String) - Method in class implementations.CalendarImpl
 
createAppointment(String, Date, long, String, String) - Method in interface interfaces.Calendar
This method creates and returns an Appointment with the passed topic, start date, duration, location and description.
createComment(String) - Method in class implementations.AppointmentImpl
 
createComment(String) - Method in interface interfaces.Appointment
This method creates a Comment for this Appointment and returns it.
createEmptyComment() - Method in class test.TestComments
This test checks whether the creation of a comment without or with empty context does fail (as it should).
createUser(String, String, URI) - Method in class implementations.CalendarImpl
 
createUser(String, String, URI) - Method in interface interfaces.Calendar
This method creates a new known User for this Calendar.
CREATOR_PROPERTY_ID - Static variable in class implementations.CommentImpl
